text: Zhenhai Duan | Zhenhai Duan Associate Professor Office: 162 Love Building Telephone: (850) 645-1561 E-Mail: duan [ at cs dot fsu dot edu ] Visit Personal Page Research Dr. Duan’s research interests are broadly in computer networks, multimedia applications, and modeling and performance analysis of computer systems. Currently he is focusing on the scalable QoS control and management in the Internet, Internet routing protocols and service architectures, networking security, and wireless networks.
